name: YouTube Throwback (2014-2017) (NOT FINISHED!)
description: YouTube has announced in February 2020 that they would be removing their old UI. Several iterations of this UI have been used since 2013 with the introduction of the Channel One layout. This layout brings back the look of the old layout.
additional_info: Note that the new YouTube UI is still built with Polymer 1.x., so if you used the old layout on browsers like Firefox, you may still encounter performance issues.
